item.title: By: protohedgehog
item.dc:creator: protohedgehog
item.description:
In reply to <a href="http://fossilsandshit.com/paleorxiv-now-open-for-submissions/#comment-2630">Andres Elgorriaga</a>.
Let's go with June just to be on the safe side :) And I would love a submission from you all, either as part of the pre-launch set, or after we've gone live!
Best,
Jon
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Andres Elgorriaga.

Let’s go with June just to be on the safe side ðŸ™‚ And I would love a submission from you all, either as part of the pre-launch set, or after we’ve gone live!

Best,

Jon

item.title: By: Andres Elgorriaga
item.dc:creator: Andres Elgorriaga
item.description: Great initiative, hope to contribute with this in the near future! (with a submission or in any other way that may be useful). I know that the launch date is imminent, but do you have a more specific date? something like this month or June or July, is more than enough. I could use that kind of information to persuade co-authors to submit an almost finished manuscript. Thanks for your efforts.
item.content:encoded:
Great initiative, hope to contribute with this in the near future! (with a submission or in any other way that may be useful). I know that the launch date is imminent, but do you have a more specific date? something like this month or June or July, is more than enough. I could use that kind of information to persuade co-authors to submit an almost finished manuscript.
Thanks for your efforts.

item.title: By: Brian Beatty
item.dc:creator: Brian Beatty
item.description: Hi Jon, This is excellent, I'm really glad to see this being done and you've got the right place and mindset to do it. I'm going to see what I can submit soon, and also spread the word. Cheers, Brian
item.content:encoded:
Hi Jon,
This is excellent, I’m really glad to see this being done and you’ve got the right place and mindset to do it.
I’m going to see what I can submit soon, and also spread the word.
Cheers,
Brian
